attributes.action: Ensure all meat products from religious non stun slaughtered animals are marked
attributes.additional_details:
For too long we have been served Religious slaughtered meat using barbaric non stun
This is being forced onto us without our knowledge or consent and it is purely for appeasement and profit

I want all packaging of meat products, Processed and ready meals and menu's to carry clear markings so people can make an informed choice as to whether they would like to buy or not
attributes.background:
Religious butchery is now on an industrial scale, where schools, hospitals, restaurants and supermarkets are using it, giving it to everyone without our knowledge or consent
For the most part- supermarkets- this is done purely for profit
